attributes.action: MPS TO BLOCK NEW EU TREATY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The british people have been refused a referendum on the eu treaty by two faced gordon brown sign a petition calling on all mps from all partys to rally together and backlash against the new eu reform treaty.

rejection.details: This petition does not call for action from the Prime Minister.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
